title: Hypnobox
description: Hypnobox offers a mobile app designed to help users with self-hypnosis and personal development. The app provides a range of hypnosis sessions aimed at improving mental health, breaking habits, and enhancing well-being.

title: AlloyTester
description: AlloyTester specializes in testing and analysis services for metal alloys. They provide high-quality inspection and material analysis, helping businesses ensure the quality and reliability of their materials in various industries, including manufacturing and construction.

title: Concentro
description: Concentro is a consulting firm that focuses on the development of medium-sized businesses. They offer services related to mergers, acquisitions, strategic development, and digital transformation, helping companies optimize their operations and grow sustainably.

title: Med-Spezialisten
description: Med-Spezialisten is a medical service provider that connects patients with specialists. Their platform makes it easier to book consultations with top medical professionals in various fields, ensuring patients receive high-quality care tailored to their needs.

title: Doc-Spezialisten
description: Doc-Spezialisten GmbH is a healthcare company that specializes in providing access to specialized medical care. They facilitate patient connections with expert doctors in various medical disciplines, ensuring top-tier professional care and treatment options.

title: Vilo Personal
description: Vilo Personal is a recruitment agency that specializes in providing staffing solutions for businesses. They focus on matching qualified candidates with companies across various industries, ensuring a perfect fit for both employers and job seekers.
